name: Mini Veggie Puff Pizzas

ingredients.name: mix of red pepper, grated carrots, and green onion

preparation: Heat a frying pan over medium heat, and add oil and veggies. Sauté for 1 minute. Stir in Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning, Salt and Pepper. Set aside.
In a small bowl, combine Creamy Ranch Dip Mix and cream cheese until easy to spread.
On a Sheet Pan Liner, roll puff pastry into a 10.5” square. Gently flip onto an appy maker. Using a rolling pin, firmly roll over to cut pastry.
Spread triangles with cream cheese mixture: 1⁄2 tsp for small, 1–2 tsp for large.
Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Top with veggies, and bake until pastry puffs: approximately 10–11 minutes for small, 12–14 minutes for large.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice & noodle dish.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
